synopsis.text:
NexRace, a revolutionary motorsport event, has taken the world by storm in the near future. With cutting-edge technology enabling vehicles to reach speeds of up to 500 km/h, the high-stakes world of racing has been forever changed. The sport is further transformed by AI control support and a 'Revolburst' mechanism, making it an adrenaline-fueled spectacle.

Enter Rin Rindou, a former ballet dancer whose dreams were shattered by an injury. Having retreated from the world to live as a NEET and gamer in her grandmother's house, Rin's life takes an unexpected turn when she is catapulted into the thrilling universe of NexRace. Despite being a newcomer, Rin's natural talent and determination make her a force to be reckoned with, shaking up the established order of the sport.

As Rin competes against seasoned racers and AI drivers, she finds herself drawn into a fierce technological race, where innovation is the key to victory. In this high-speed world, Rin must push herself to the limit to emerge victorious and redefine her future.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
